title:
Re Wrightsville Beach parking charges!



Why do they charge so much and where does this money go?  I could not find anyone who knows.  Plus, why do they not offer a seasonal pass for Wilmington residents?  I am guessing that Wrightsville Beach is a bit greedy and do not really want anyone on their beach.
text:
Here's a link with information about parking policies:

http://www.townofwrightsvillebeach.com/Parking/ParkingQA/tabid/77/Default.aspx
